member.name: T:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.Legacy.ScriptedTemplateContentHandler
member.summary: Template Content Handler for (legacy) scripted Templates: VBScript and JScript Templates.

member.name: T:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler
member.summary: Abstract base class for Template Content Handlers: classes with knowledge about how to find references in template content (for a specific template type).
member.remarks: Note that separate Template Content Handler instances are used for each Template instance. Furthermore, all template content processing for one Template instance is performed on the same Template Content Handler instance. Therefore, Template Content Handler can be implemented in a statefull manner: keeping state across method calls.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.#ctor(Tridion.ContentManager.TcmUri)
member.summary: Create a new Template Content Handler instance for a given Template.
member.param: The ID (TCM URI) of the Template of which the content should be processed.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.ValidateContent
member.summary: Validate the template's content.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.ExtractReferences
member.summary: Extract references to (potential) TCM items from the Template's content.
member.returns: The URIs (either TCM URIs or WebDAV URLs) of potential TCM items.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.SubstituteReferences(System.String[])
member.summary: Substitute references to TCM items in the Template's content.
member.param: An array of URIs (either TCM URIs or WebDAV URLs) to substitute. The array has the same size and order as the one returned by . Extracted reference which turned out not to point to an existing TCM item will have a null newReference.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.SubstituteRefTitles(System.String[])
member.summary: Substitute the referenced titles in the template's content (if applicable)
member.param: A string array containing the new titles. The array has the same size and order as the one passed in
member.remarks: The content of a template can contain titles of referenced items. When reading a template, the Tridion Business Layer uses the ExtractReferences method to retrieve a list of references. It then calls SubstituteRefTitles to update the reference titles SubstituteReferences to fixup the reference URIs. The default implementation of this method does nothing. Template Content Handlers for template types that have referenced titles in their content should override this method.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.Content
member.summary: Get or set the textual content of the Template.
member.remarks: This property reflects the substituted references after has been called.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.BinaryContent
member.summary: Gets or sets the binary content of the Template.
member.remarks: This property reflects the substituted references after has been called.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.WebDavUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the WebDAV URL of the Template's container (i.e. the Organizational Item).

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.TemplateId
member.summary: Gets the ID (TCM URI) of the template.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.Legacy.ScriptedTemplateContentHandler.#ctor(Tridion.ContentManager.TcmUri)
member.summary: Create a new Template Content Handler instance for a given Template Id.
member.param: The ID (TCM URI) of the Template of which the content should be processed.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.Legacy.ScriptedTemplateContentHandler.ValidateContent
member.summary: Validate the Template's content.
member.remarks: Validates that all references contain either a TCM URI of a TBB or a WebDAV URL.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.Legacy.ScriptedTemplateContentHandler.ExtractReferences
member.summary: Extract references to (potential) TCM items from the Template's content.
member.returns: An array of URIs (either TCM URIs or WebDAV URLs) of potential TCM items.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.Legacy.ScriptedTemplateContentHandler.SubstituteReferences(System.String[])
member.summary: Substitute references to TCM items in the Template's (binary) content.
member.param: An array of URIs (either TCM URIs or WebDAV URLs) to substitute. The number of elements and order of the elements in the array corresponds to the array returned by . Extracted reference which turned out not to point to an existing TCM item will have a null newReference.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.Legacy.ScriptedTemplateContentHandler.InternalExtractReferences(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get a list of Regex Captures for all references in the Template's content.
member.param: Indicates whether reference TCM URIs should be validated.

member.name: T:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType
member.summary: This class represents a template type
member.remarks: The class is public, internally creatable and exposes read-only properties. Use the TemplateTypeRegistry's TemplateTypes property to access an object of this class.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.#ctor(Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.Configuration.TemplateType)
member.summary: Internal constuctor, used by the TemplateTypeRegistry to create a TemplateType object
member.param: Configuration type object exposing the collection of template types.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.GetLocalizedTitle(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Gets the title (display name) of the template type in a given language.
member.remarks: If no title resource exists for the given language, the standard .NET language fallback mechanism applies.
member.param: The language in which to get the title
member.returns: The title in the given language or the symbolic name if no title resource is configured.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.AssertInitialized
member.summary: Used to test if the private members have been serialized. This is necessary because the TemplateType class has a parameter-less constructor which doesn't initialize the object. The constructor is required to be serializable.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.AssertTemplateType(Tridion.ContentManager.ItemType)
member.summary: Asserts if the type is registered for the template.
member.param: Type of the item.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.Id
member.summary: Gets the numeric identifier of the template type.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.Name
member.summary: Gets the (symbolic) name of the template type.
member.remarks: This is the symbolic name that is used in the XML representation of a template.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.Title
member.summary: Gets the title (display name) of the template type.
member.remarks: The title is localizable, i.e. it depends on the . To get the title in another language, use . Use the property for a non-localizable, symbolic name (used in XML).

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.MimeType
member.summary: Gets the template content's mimetype.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.HasBinaryContent
member.summary: Whether the template's content is a binary stream or not.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.WebDavFileExtensions
member.summary: A collection object representing the WebDavFileExtensions for this template type.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.WebDavFileExtensionMappings
member.summary: A collection of for this template type.

member.name: T:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateTypeRegistry
member.summary: Entry point for handling template type specific functionality.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateTypeRegistry.LoadTemplateTypes(Tridion.ContentManager.ItemType)

member.summary: Use this static method to get a filtered representation of the template types in the Tridion Content Manager system in the form of an object model.
member.param: Only template types that are available for this item type are returned. Supported s are: , and .

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateTypeRegistry.GetTemplateTypes
member.summary: Use this static method to get a representation of all the template types in the Tridion Content Manager system in the form of an object model.

member.summary: Use this static method to get a representation of a specific template type.

member.returns: The TemplateType object defined by the id of the template type.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateTypeRegistry.GetTemplateType(System.String)
member.summary: Use this static method to get a representation of a specific template type.
member.param: The name of the template type.
member.returns: The TemplateType object defined by the title of the template type.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateTypeRegistry.GetTemplateContentHandler(Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType,Tridion.ContentManager.TcmUri)
member.summary: Gets the correct template's content handler related to the provided template information.
member.param: The TemplateType for which the content handler should be retrieved
The template's TCM URI for which the content handler should be retrieved
member.returns: The TemplateContentHandler object for the provided template information
